item.title: A Practical Overview of AutoML for Tabular Data @ DevClub.ee #150
A Practical Overview of AutoML for Tabular Data @ DevClub.lv #101
item.description: Automated Machine Learning (AutoML) became popular in recent years, focusing on cost reduction for building an ML pipeline. The following scientists’ daily tasks can be partially or fully automated: data preparation, feature engineering, model generation, and model estimation. We will briefly overview the existing AutoML solutions and show a practical example based on our winning solution for Sussex-Huawei Locomotion Challenge 2021. In particular, we will discuss how to train a classifier model using Google AutoML Tables for tabular data effectively and with minimal effort.

item.title: SHL Challenge 2021 - Human activity recognition with AutoML using smartphone radio data

item.title: ZIBIT 2020 - Human Activity Recognition with Smartphone Sensors Using Machine Learning Algorithms
SHL Challenge 2019 poster presentation: Semi-supervised learning for human activity recognition using adversarial autoencoders
Become a Web Developer from Scratch
E-Commerce search
item.description: Search is the cornerstone of online shopping. I will share our experience on creating cutting-edge site search functionality and will reflect on achieved results.

item.title: Testing Automation with PhantomJS
item.description: Testing is a very time-consuming task and it requires automation to reduce costs and regression issues. I will share our experience on test automation and will tell you how we reduced the test execution time 10x.

item.title: BEM - Methodology for creating CSS
item.description: Presenation focused to BEM Methodology and how it can be used without BEM-tools and share knowledge that have been obtained during BEM integration into our company.
